articles.author: Kyle Feldscher
articles.title: Mark Sanchez now facing felony charge in Indianapolis fight that left him hospitalized with stab wounds - CNN
articles.description: Former NFL quarterback and current analyst Mark Sanchez is facing a felony charge for his role in an altercation that led to the former New York Jet being stabbed early Saturday morning.
articles.content:
Former NFL quarterback and current analyst Mark Sanchez is facing a felony charge for his role in an altercation that led to the former New York Jet being stabbed early Saturday morning.
